message: My grandpa was on the USS Halsey Powell destroyer that shelled Iwo Jima with the battle group until they secured the island. I'm pretty sure he saw that flag raised as well :)

Remarkable, the indigenous Africans in their native Egypt with cradles of civilisation over 10,000 years ago along the African River Nile - language, writing, science, engineering & culture. And most importantly the associated social engineering to achieve civilisation whilst most of the rest of the world were eking out a living as barbaric nomadic hunters & gatherers. Alien incursions & invasions starting with the Italian Roman Natives, Persian Natives, Arab Natives, & Western European Natives have all but destroyed the nucleus of civilization & the once great Native Africans.
